get.description: Health check endpoint with DB connectivity check.
Resolve outlink token from DB and redirect. Optionally logs a click.

delete.description: Delete a profile and all related data (therapists, shifts, etc.).

post.description: Delete all profiles matching the name pattern (for seed cleanup).

parameters.name: name_pattern

schema.description: Delete profiles with names containing this pattern
schema.title: Name Pattern

parameters.description: Delete profiles with names containing this pattern

get.description: Get a specific shop by ID.

schema.title: Response Admin Upsert Availability Endpoint Api Admin Shops  Shop Id  Availability Put

patch.description: Update buffer minutes for a shop.

post.description:
Generate or regenerate photo embeddings for therapists.

This endpoint allows administrators to generate embeddings for:
- All therapists without embeddings (default)
- Specific therapist IDs
- Force regeneration of existing embeddings

get.description: Get embedding status for a specific therapist.

post.description:
Start batch computation of photo embeddings in the background.

This endpoint triggers a background task to compute embeddings for
all therapists without embeddings. The task runs asynchronously.

get.description:
List therapists for a shop with optional availability.

Returns published therapists with their tags, photos, and availability slots.
Useful for shop detail pages where users want to see available therapists.

parameters.name: shop_id

schema.description: If set, restricts search to this shop/profile
schema.title: Shop Id

parameters.description: If set, restricts search to this shop/profile

schema.title: Response List Guest Reservations Api Api Guest Reservations Get

post.description:
Generate LINE OAuth authorization URL.

Returns a URL that the client should redirect the user to for LINE authentication.

Handle LINE OAuth callback.

Exchanges authorization code for access token, fetches user profile,
and creates/updates user session.

get.description: Get LINE connection status for the current user.

post.description:
Generate Google OAuth authorization URL.

Returns a URL that the client should redirect the user to for Google authentication.

Handle Google OAuth callback.

Exchanges authorization code for access token, fetches user profile,
and creates/updates user session.

get.description: Get Google connection status for the current user.

schema.title: Response List Favorites Api Favorites Get
Response List Therapist Favorites Api Favorites Therapists Get
Response Line Ping Api Line Ping Get

post.description:
Stamp the database with a specific alembic revision without running migrations.

Use this to mark the database as being at a specific migration version
when the actual schema is already in sync but alembic_version is missing.

Run alembic database migrations.

This endpoint runs 'alembic upgrade head' to apply any pending migrations.
Protected by the ops_api_token.

get.description:
Check the health of database backups.

Returns unhealthy if:
- No backups found
- Latest backup is older than 48 hours
- Cannot access backup storage

post.description:
Clear cache(s).

Args:
    cache_type: Which caches to clear ("all", "memory", "redis", or specific cache name)

schema.title: Response Clear Caches Api Ops Cache Clear Post

post.description:
Warm up cache by pre-loading common data.

Args:
    cache_type: Which cache to warm ("shops", "therapists", or "all")

schema.title: Response Warm Cache Api Ops Cache Warm Post

get.description: List all managers for a shop.

post.description: Add a new manager to a shop. Only owners can add managers.

patch.description: Update a manager's role. Only owners can update managers.

delete.description: Remove a manager from a shop. Only owners can remove managers.

get.description: List GuestReservations for a shop (dashboard view).

patch.description: Update a GuestReservation status from the dashboard.

get.description: List reviews for a specific shop with optional status filter.
Get review statistics for a shop.

schema.title: Response Get Shop Review Stats Api Dashboard Shops  Profile Id  Reviews Stats Get

get.description: Get a single review detail for a shop.

put.description: Update the status of a review (moderate: approve/reject).

schema.title: Response List Shifts Api Dashboard Shops  Profile Id  Shifts Get
Response List Dashboard Therapists Api Dashboard Shops  Profile Id  Therapists Get
Response Reorder Dashboard Therapists Api Dashboard Shops  Profile Id  Therapists Reorder Post

get.description:
Get therapist detail with shop info and availability.

Query Parameters:
    - shop_slug: Optional. Verify therapist belongs to this shop.
    - entry_source: Track where user came from (shop_page, search, direct).
    - days: Number of days to fetch availability (default 7).
    - slot_granularity_minutes: Granularity of slots (default 30).

Error Codes:
    - therapist_not_found: Therapist ID does not exist.
    - shop_slug_mismatch: Therapist does not belong to specified shop.

Get similar therapists based on tag similarity.

Returns therapists similar to the given therapist, sorted by similarity score.
Includes availability information for today.

Query Parameters:
    - limit: Number of similar therapists to return (default 6, max 20).

Error Codes:
    - therapist_not_found: Therapist ID does not exist or is not published.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of similar therapists to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of similar therapists to return

post.description:
Subscribe to push notifications.

Args:
    subscription: Push subscription information from browser
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Success response

Unsubscribe from push notifications.

Args:
    subscription: Push subscription information
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Success response

Send a test push notification.

Args:
    request: Test notification details
    current_user: Current authenticated user
    db: Database session

Returns:
    Success response

get.description:
Get VAPID public key for push notifications.

Returns:
    VAPID public key

schema.title: Response Get Vapid Public Key Api Push Vapid Key Get

AddShopManagerRequest.title: AddShopManagerRequest
AddShopManagerRequest.description: Request to add a new shop manager.

AddShopManagerResponse.title: AddShopManagerResponse
AddShopManagerResponse.description: Response after adding a shop manager.

start_at.title: Start At
start_at.description: ISO datetime of the available start

end_at.title: End At
end_at.description: ISO datetime of the available end

status.title: Status
status.description: Slot status: open=available, tentative=needs confirmation, blocked=unavailable

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Number of therapists to process in each batch

DeleteShopManagerResponse.title: DeleteShopManagerResponse
DeleteShopManagerResponse.description: Response after deleting a shop manager.

therapist_ids.title: Therapist Ids
therapist_ids.description: Specific therapist IDs to regenerate. If None, generates for all without embeddings.

force.title: Force
force.description: Force regeneration even if embeddings already exist

SimilarTherapistItem.title: SimilarTherapistItem
SimilarTherapistItem.description: Similar therapist item for frontend display.

is_available.title: Is Available
is_available.description: True if slot can be booked

StaffTags.title: StaffTags
StaffTags.description: Tags for staff profile display (mood, style, look, etc.).

UpdateShopManagerRequest.title: UpdateShopManagerRequest
UpdateShopManagerRequest.description: Request to update a shop manager's role.

UpdateShopManagerResponse.title: UpdateShopManagerResponse
UpdateShopManagerResponse.description: Response after updating a shop manager.

app__domains__site__guest_matching__sche.title: SimilarTherapistItem
app__domains__site__guest_matching__sche.description:
Response item for /similar. All scores are normalized to 0..1.

photo_similarity is a placeholder that will later be replaced with an embedding
similarity score; v1 mirrors tag_similarity.
